author: Dr. Susan Berry
title: Court Rules Texas Can Ban Abortions During Pandemic
description: A federal appeals court backed the state of Texas Tuesday by allowing its enforcement of a ban on most abortions during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
A federal appeals court backed the state of Texas Tuesday by allowing its enforcement of a ban on most abortions during the coronavirus pandemic.
